titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-05-26 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 26, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer) with the Texas Troubadours, Hank Snow (host/performer), and performers the Wilburn Brothers, Charlie Walker, the Duke Of Paducah, Del Wood, and Lefty Frizzell. This performance of the Opry celebrates National Country Music Day and includes a speech from Carrie Rogers. Held in Meridian, MS.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
